english: Bryan remained the titular head of the party .
He respected the dust of our leader .
chinese: 他瞻仰了我们伟大领袖的遗骸。

english: Mr. chamberlain was their chosen leader .
chinese: 张伯伦先生是他们推选的领袖。

english: Such men can become leaders in enterprise .
chinese: 这种人可能成为企业界的领袖。

english: She determined to be loyal to her leader .

chinese: 领袖造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: He was essentially a shrewd battle leader .
chinese: 他本质上是一位机敏的战场领袖。

english: And fate gave them a generous leader .
chinese: 而命运又给了他们一个胸怀豁达的领袖。

english: The leaders of the two nations decided to make peace .
The chiefs who had nursed it were long dead .
chinese: 培养它的领袖们也都早已去世了。

english: They raised their fists in salute to their leader .
chinese: 他们举起拳头向领袖致敬。

english: They told me he was the captain of the gang .
chinese: 她们对我说他是那帮大盗的领袖。

english: The seaport cities supplied most of the leaders .
chinese: 港口城市产生了许多领袖人物。

english: Great crises often call forth gifted leaders .
chinese: 危急存亡之际常能产生天才的领袖。

english: The death of its leader was a body-blow to the party .
chinese: 领袖的逝世对党是巨大的损失。
